site.name: 8px.app
site.description:
Control every color, every icon.
A free toolkit for web and app developers including Favicon generation, color palette creation, SVG optimization, and more.
No account required, ready to use immediately.
site.heroDescription:
Control every color, every icon.
A toolkit for web and app developers.
All free, All open source.

tw-palette-generator.name: TW Palette Generator
tw-palette-generator.description:
Automatically generate color palettes optimized for TailwindCSS from your chosen colors.
Create cohesive color schemes from 50 to 950 based on your corporate or brand colors for free.
tw-palette-generator.shortDescription: Generate color palettes from selected colors

iromide.name: Iromide - Oshi Color Generator
iromide.description:
A free tool to generate color palettes of your favorite colors from photos.
Extract your "oshi colors" with image analysis close to human perception.
Easy SNS sharing with polaroid-style design.
iromide.shortDescription: Create your oshi color polaroid from photos!

favicon-generator.name: Favicon Generator
favicon-generator.description:
A free batch favicon generation tool. Simply upload images in PNG, JPEG, SVG, or other formats to automatically generate all sizes of favicons and Apple Touch Icons needed for your website.
Easily complete rounded corner processing and background color settings right in your browser.

svg-optimizer.name: SVG Optimizer
svg-optimizer.description:
A free SVG optimization and compression tool. Reduce file size while maintaining quality and improve website loading speed.
Secure and fast optimization completed entirely in the browser.

password-generator.name: Password Generator
password-generator.description:
A free powerful password generation tool. Create secure passwords by freely combining character length, uppercase/lowercase letters, numbers, and symbols.
Supports exclusion of confusing characters and is safe with browser-only processing.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: Learn about our handling of personal information and data processing.

common.privacyNotice: Images are processed securely in your browser and never sent to servers.
common.dragDropAnywhere: Or drag and drop anywhere on the screen
common.imageProcessingOnlyNotice: Images are only used for processing and are not stored
common.fileValidationError: An error occurred while validating the file.
common.networkError: A network error occurred. Please try again later.

faviconGenerator.uploadHint: Upload PNG, JPG, WEBP, SVG or other image files (max 10MB)
faviconGenerator.borderRadiusHint: Round the corners of the icon. Apple Touch Icons are automatically rounded by iOS.
faviconGenerator.backgroundColorHint: Add background color to transparent PNGs. Background color is always applied to Apple Touch Icons.

errors.selectOutputFormat: Please select at least one output format
errors.selectSize: Please select at least one size when favicon.ico is selected

twPaletteGenerator.historyEmptyMessage: You can add created color palettes to history

passwordGenerator.characterTypesHint: At least one character of selected types will be included
passwordGenerator.avoidAmbiguousHint: Such as 0 and O, 1 and l and I

svgOptimizer.precisionHint: Adjust numeric precision. Lower values increase compression but reduce precision.

groups.dangerousDescription: Security risks exist. Use only with trusted SVG files.

errors.shareNotSupported: Share feature is not supported in your browser. Please download the image.

iromide.shareText: What color is your favorite? Create a palette with Iromide!
